casebody.data:
RENOWN HEALTH, a Nevada Non-Profit Corporation; Renown Regional Medical Center, a Nevada Non-Profit Corporation; and Nevada Heart Institute, d/b/a Renown Institute for Heart & Vascular Health, a Nevada Non-Profit Corporation, Appellants,
v.
HOLLAND & HART, LLP; and Robert C. Anderson, Respondents. No. 72039 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 05, 2019

AFFIRMED.
